name: Adventures of The Carrot Captain
description:
'Tally-ho, kids!
Are you ready for another carrot'd adventure?
Starring your 3rd favourite cartoon carrot?!'

Join Captain Carrot as he returns to the call of adventure throughout the Vegetable Kingdom!

Grab your bowl of Captain Carrot cereal and a tall glass of tomato-orange juice and join our hero Captain Carrot as he returns to his Saturday morning adventures through the Vegetable Kingdom!





YOU SHALL! Encounter a cornucopia of baddies, obstacles, new forms, and platforming challenges as you traverse the various stages!

THIS GAME IS! A challenging 2D platformer with an emphasis on movement, ground pound timing, and a falling double jump called a 'carrot jump' inspired by classic Saturday cartoons.

IT FEATURES! 
- an overworld to roam!
- unlock new forms with new play styles!
- colourful enemies to best and NPCs to meet!
- a slay spare boss system!
- multiple endings!
- bird watching
- shops and items to unlock different areas!
- fishing, surfing.... and volleyball?


.
